action.action-desc: Mrs. Dingell (for herself and Mr. McGovern) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Foreign Affairs

form.official-title: To amend the State Department Basic Authorities Act of 1956 to eliminate the repatriation loan program, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Leave No Americans Behind Act of 2022.

section.header: Elimination of repatriation loans by Department of State
